headline.print_headline: Flooding Swells Montana Rivers, Washes Out Roads
headline.main: Flooding Swells Montana Rivers, Washes Out Roads

docs.snippet: Swollen rivers and impassable roads left hundreds of people cut off in rural areas of Montana on Monday, while in neighboring Wyoming members of the National Guard joined the fight to protect two towns threatened by high water....
docs.lead_paragraph: Swollen rivers and impassable roads left hundreds of people cut off in rural areas of Montana on Monday, while in neighboring Wyoming members of the National Guard joined the fight to protect two towns threatened by high water.

headline.print_headline: Mexico Probes Soccer Team in Citigroup Fraud Case
headline.main: Mexico Probes Soccer Team in Citigroup Fraud Case

docs.snippet: Mexican authorities are investigating whether the owner of a Mexican oil services company that allegedly defrauded Citigroup used his professional soccer team to launder money....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mexican authorities are investigating whether the owner of a Mexican oil services company that allegedly defrauded Citigroup used his professional soccer team to launder money.

headline.main: Zombies, Workout Music and Baby Trackers: Health Tech for Everyone

docs.snippet: Amid a deluge of health apps and devices washing over consumers, there are some quirky, intriguing products that may have escaped your notice. Here are the best of them....

headline.print_headline: Cain Is Perfect for 5 Innings but Cubs Top Giants
headline.main: Cain Is Perfect for 5 Innings but Cubs Top Giants

docs.lead_paragraph: Matt Cain pitched five perfect innings for the San Francisco Giants on Monday, but the Chicago Cubs rallied for a 3-2 victory.

headline.print_headline: Freescale Loss in Malaysia Tragedy Leads to Travel Policy Questions
headline.main: Freescale Loss in Malaysia Tragedy Leads to Travel Policy Questions

docs.snippet: The loss of 20 key Freescale Semiconductor employees in the disappearance of a Malaysian airliner on Saturday raises questions about whether the company should have allowed so many of them to board the same plane, but security experts said that at...
docs.lead_paragraph: The loss of 20 key Freescale Semiconductor employees in the disappearance of a Malaysian airliner on Saturday raises questions about whether the company should have allowed so many of them to board the same plane, but security experts said that at big corporations it's hard to avoid.

headline.print_headline: Darvish Goes 5 Innings as Reds Beat Rangers
headline.main: Darvish Goes 5 Innings as Reds Beat Rangers

headline.print_headline: Barcelona Have Done Nothing Wrong in Neymar Transfer-Club President
headline.main: Barcelona Have Done Nothing Wrong in Neymar Transfer-Club President

docs.snippet: The controversy surrounding the transfer of Brazilian Neymar to Barcelona is "unfair" because the Spanish champions have done nothing wrong, club president Josep Maria Bartomeu said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The controversy surrounding the transfer of Brazilian Neymar to Barcelona is "unfair" because the Spanish champions have done nothing wrong, club president Josep Maria Bartomeu said on Monday.

headline.main: Cashner' Scoreless Again; Padres Beat Rockies 5-0
